description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Jump right in and defend your wall in this return to one of the most popular games in history. Featuring unlimited hours of gameplay you can battle your friends head to head until they cry out for mercy.  Supports 1-2 Players, the controls are easy to learn but difficult to master.
